REGISTRATION_FIELD_ERROR_PASSWORD_NOT_MA: in the password must be at least 5 characters

roleFeatures.FEATURE_1: I can work with your system without making a credit card or any other payment
roleFeatures.FEATURE_2: For the money received for the introduced irrelevant client, I can open the relevant client
roleFeatures.FEATURE_3: I can cash out the money received for the deposited customer
roleFeatures.FEATURE_4: I am willing to pay only with the deals that I closed and got money for them
roleFeatures.FEATURE_5: I do not have to give a customers in order to get others in return. I can pay for the received relevant customers through a credit card
roleFeatures.FEATURE_6: I can get monetary benefits for the irrelevant Clients for my business
roleFeatures.FEATURE_7: I can give away my customers only for deals to earn from successfully closed deals
roleFeatures.FEATURE_8: I can change the irrelevant client to the relevant one
roleFeatures.FEATURE_9: Give the client to a private group
roleFeatures.FEATURE_10: I want to be able to work exclusively with a client
roleFeatures.FEATURE_11: I do not have to record the process of working with my clients
roleFeatures.FEATURE_12: I can manage my sellers in the system

PERSONAL_DATA_PHONE_ERROR_LENGTH: the length of the phone number must be at least 9 digits

#21: Страница по работе с кредитами агента

credits.title: Credits
credits.replenishment_comment: Input of money into the system account
credits.withdrawal_comment: Withdrawal of money from the system account

payByBankAlert.title: Pay by bank
payByBankAlert.message: For payment via bank transfer, transfer money to the details listed below, then click on the 'Already paid' button {{requisites}}

makeReplenishmentAlert.title: Replenishment
makeReplenishmentAlert.message: The statement was successful created under the number № {{resultId}}. To continue, pay the statement and mark it

makeWithdrawalAlert.title: Withdrawal
makeWithdrawalAlert.message: The statement was successful created under the number № {{resultId}}. Soon your statement will be processed.

BankTransactionAlertSuccess.title: Payment confirmed
BankTransactionAlertSuccess.message: After processing the payment by the administration, the money will be credited to your wallet in the system

NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Ionic Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Ionic Super Starter is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Super Starter README for a full tutorial
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
